alert.note: Alert for St. Charles; Warren (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 2:48PM CDT until August 03 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL ST. CHARLES AND SOUTHEASTERN WARREN COUNTIES... At 248 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Innsbrook, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Wentzville, Warrenton, Wright City, Truesdale, Innsbrook, New Melle, Treloar, Foristell and Holstein. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between exits 193 and 203. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
